function.name: access_remote_machine
function.description: AMCP Remote Machine Access Guide: Use JSON format parameters {instruction,path,row,value} to execute these commands: (1)tell-folder:display folder contents,requires path=/path/; (2)tell-process:show running processes,params=0; (3)tell-nvidia:display GPU status,params=0; (4)tell-memory:show memory usage,params=0; (5)tell-disk:show disk usage,params=0; (6)read-file:read file content,requires path=/path/file,row=starting_line(usually 1); (7)search-in-file:search within file,requires path=/path/file,value=keyword; (8)tell-cpu:show CPU info,params=0; (9)search-file:find files,requires path=search_scope,value=target_name; (10)tell-git:view Git repo,requires path={'owner':'owner_name','repo':'repo_name'}; (11)read-git-file:read Git repo file,requires path={'owner':'owner_name','repo':'repo_name','filename':'file_path'},optional row=starting_line. (12)tell-git-folder:view files in a specific folder of a Git repo,requires path={'owner':'owner_name','repo':'repo_name','folder_path':'folder_relative_path'}. Set unused parameters to 0.

instruction.description: choose the command you want to use.

frontend.title: remote access(simple)
frontend.tips: tell users what your tool can do.
